item_prototype.name: Free disk space in {#CTNAME}
item_prototype.description: Свободное место в контейнере, по данным vzquota

item_prototype.name: Free disk space in {#CTNAME} (percentage)
item_prototype.description: Свободное место в контейнере, по данным vzquota

item_prototype.name: Free inodes in {#CTNAME} (percentage)
item_prototype.description: Количество свободных inodes в контейнере, по данным vzquota

item_prototype.name: Total disk space in {#CTNAME}
item_prototype.description: Всего места в контейнере, по данным vzquota. Используется softlimit.

item_prototype.name: Used disk space in {#CTNAME}
item_prototype.description: Используется места в контейнере, по данным vzquota. Используется softlimit.

trigger_prototype.name: Free disk space is less than {$CT_DISK_THRESHOLD_WARN}% in CT {#CTNAME}
trigger_prototype.description: Свободное место в контейнере меньше порогового. Порог задаётся макросом $CT_DISK_THRESHOLD_WARN

trigger_prototype.name: Free inodes is less than 20% in CT {#CTNAME}
Free UBC resource dcachesize is less then 10% in {#CTNAME} on server {HOSTNAME}
Free UBC resource dgramrcvbuf is less then 10% in {#CTNAME} on server {HOSTNAME}
Free UBC resource kmemsize is less then 10% in {#CTNAME} on server {HOSTNAME}
Free UBC resource lockedpages is less then 10% in {#CTNAME} on server {HOSTNAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template OpenVZ dont use:openvz.ubc[{#CTID},numfile,2].last()} / {Template OpenVZ dont use:openvz.ubc[{#CTID},numfile,5].last()} ) > 0.9
trigger_prototype.name: Free UBC resource numfile is less then 10% in {#CTNAME} on server {HOSTNAME}
Free UBC resource numflock is less then 10% in {#CTNAME} on server {HOSTNAME}
Free UBC resource numiptent is less then 10% in {#CTNAME} on server {HOSTNAME}
Free UBC resource numothersock is less then 10% in {#CTNAME} on server {HOSTNAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template OpenVZ dont use:openvz.ubc[{#CTID},numproc,2].last()} / {Template OpenVZ dont use:openvz.ubc[{#CTID},numproc,5].last()} ) > 0.9
trigger_prototype.name: Free UBC resource numproc is less then 10% in {#CTNAME} on server {HOSTNAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template OpenVZ dont use:openvz.ubc[{#CTID},numpty,2].last()} / {Template OpenVZ dont use:openvz.ubc[{#CTID},numpty,5].last()} ) > 0.9
